meanings.definition: A person who is hesitant or indecisive in their actions or opinions.
meanings.sent1: The pussyfooter took a long time to make up their mind about which movie to watch.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a pussyfooter, just choose a flavor of ice cream already!
meanings.sent3: The pussyfooter couldn't even decide between wearing a hat or sunglasses on a sunny day.
meanings.sent4: Her reputation as a pussyfooter made her friends question if she would ever take a risk.
meanings.sent5: The image of the pussyfooter standing at the crossroads of life, unable to pick a path, stuck in everyone's minds.

meanings.definition: To act cautiously or timidly in a situation.
meanings.sent1: She pussyfooters around the edges of the pool before finally jumping in.
meanings.sent2: Don't pussyfooter when it comes to trying new things; just go for it!
meanings.sent3: The cat pussyfooters around the unfamiliar object in the room, unsure if it's a threat.
meanings.sent4: He pussyfooters through the dark forest, afraid of what might be lurking in the shadows.
meanings.sent5: The detective pussyfooters around the crime scene, careful not to disturb any evidence.
